caption.p: Predicted range change of Calligonum mongolicum in the Junggar Basin under three climate change scenarios (i.e., optimistic—RCP2.6, moderate—RCP4.5, and pessimistic—RCP8.5) and two periods (i.e., 2050s and 2070s). Green, blue, and red colors represent overlap of current and future predicted ranges, potential range expansion, and potential range contraction, respectively
